014package org.jdbi.v3.core.transaction;
015
016import java.sql.Connection;
017import java.sql.SQLException;
018import java.sql.Savepoint;
019import java.util.Collections;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.WeakHashMap;
023
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.Handle;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.HandleCallback;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
027
028/**
029 * This <code>TransactionHandler</code> uses local JDBC transactions
030 * demarcated explicitly on the handle and passed through to be handled
031 * directly on the JDBC Connection instance.
032 */
033public class LocalTransactionHandler implements TransactionHandler {
034    private final Map<Handle, BoundLocalTransactionHandler> bound = Collections.synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
035
036    @Override
037    public void begin(Handle handle) {
038        nonspecial(handle).begin(handle);
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public void commit(Handle handle) {
043        nonspecial(handle).commit(handle);
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public void rollback(Handle handle) {
048        nonspecial(handle).rollback(handle);
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public boolean isInTransaction(Handle handle) {
053        return nonspecial(handle).isInTransaction(handle);
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public void savepoint(Handle handle, String savepointName) {
058        nonspecial(handle).savepoint(handle, savepointName);
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public void rollbackToSavepoint(Handle handle, String savepointName) {
063        nonspecial(handle).rollbackToSavepoint(handle, savepointName);
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void releaseSavepoint(Handle handle, String savepointName) {
068        nonspecial(handle).releaseSavepoint(handle, savepointName);
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public <R, X extends Exception> R inTransaction(Handle handle, HandleCallback<R, X> callback) throws X {
073        return nonspecial(handle).inTransaction(handle, callback);
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    public <R, X extends Exception> R inTransaction(Handle handle, TransactionIsolationLevel level, HandleCallback<R, X> callback) throws X {
078        return nonspecial(handle).inTransaction(handle, level, callback);
079    }
080
081    TransactionHandler nonspecial(Handle handle) {
082        return bound.computeIfAbsent(handle, Unchecked.function(BoundLocalTransactionHandler::new));
083    }
084
085    public static LocalTransactionHandler binding() {
086        return new BindingLocalTransactionHandler();
087    }
088
089    static class BindingLocalTransactionHandler extends LocalTransactionHandler {
090        @Override
091        public TransactionHandler specialize(Handle handle) throws SQLException {
092            return new BoundLocalTransactionHandler(handle);
093        }
094    }
095
096    static class BoundLocalTransactionHandler implements TransactionHandler {
097        private final Map<String, Savepoint> savepoints = new HashMap<>();
098        private boolean initialAutocommit;
099        private boolean didBegin;
100        private boolean didTxnRollback;
101
102        BoundLocalTransactionHandler(Handle handle) throws SQLException {
103            this.initialAutocommit = handle.getConnection().getAutoCommit();
104        }
105
106        @Override
107        public void begin(Handle handle) {
108            try {
109                if (!didBegin) {
110                    Connection conn = handle.getConnection(); // NOPMD
111                    initialAutocommit = conn.getAutoCommit();
112                    didTxnRollback = false;
113                    savepoints.clear();
114                    conn.setAutoCommit(false);
115                    didBegin = true;
116                }
117            } catch (SQLException e) {
118                throw new TransactionException("Failed to start transaction", e);
119            }
120        }
121
122        @Override
123        public void commit(Handle handle) {
124            try {
125                handle.getConnection().commit();
126            } catch (SQLException e) {
127                throw new TransactionException("Failed to commit transaction", e);
128            } finally {
129                restoreAutoCommitState(handle);
130            }
131        }
132
133        @Override
134        public void rollback(Handle handle) {
135            didTxnRollback = true;
136            try {
137                handle.getConnection().rollback();
138            } catch (SQLException e) {
139                throw new TransactionException("Failed to rollback transaction", e);
140            } finally {
141                restoreAutoCommitState(handle);
142            }
143        }
144
145        @Override
146        public void savepoint(Handle handle, String name) {
147            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CloseResource")
148            final Connection conn = handle.getConnection();
149            try {
150                final Savepoint savepoint = conn.setSavepoint(name);
151                savepoints.put(name, savepoint);
152            } catch (SQLException e) {
153                throw new TransactionException(String.format("Unable to create savepoint '%s'", name), e);
154            }
155        }
156
157        @Override
158        public void releaseSavepoint(Handle handle, String name) {
159            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CloseResource")
160            final Connection conn = handle.getConnection();
161            try {
162                final Savepoint savepoint = savepoints.remove(name);
163                if (savepoint == null) {
164                    throw new TransactionException(String.format("Attempt to release non-existent savepoint, '%s'",
165                                                                 name));
166                }
167                conn.releaseSavepoint(savepoint);
168            } catch (SQLException e) {
169                throw new TransactionException(String.format("Unable to create savepoint %s", name), e);
170            }
171        }
172
173        @Override
174        public void rollbackToSavepoint(Handle handle, String name) {
175            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CloseResource")
176            final Connection conn = handle.getConnection();
177            try {
178                final Savepoint savepoint = savepoints.remove(name);
179                if (savepoint == null) {
180                    throw new TransactionException(String.format("Attempt to rollback to non-existent savepoint, '%s'",
181                                                                 name));
182                }
183                conn.rollback(savepoint);
184            } catch (SQLException e) {
185                throw new TransactionException(String.format("Unable to create savepoint %s", name), e);
186            }
187        }
188
189        @Override
190        public boolean isInTransaction(Handle handle) {
191            try {
192                return !handle.getConnection().getAutoCommit();
193            } catch (SQLException e) {
194                throw new TransactionException("Failed to test for transaction status", e);
195            }
196        }
197
198        @Override
199        public <R, X extends Exception> R inTransaction(Handle handle,
200                                                        HandleCallback<R, X> callback) throws X {
201            if (isInTransaction(handle)) {
202                throw new IllegalStateException("Already in transaction");
203            }
204            didTxnRollback = false;
205            final R returnValue;
206            try {
207                handle.begin();
208                returnValue = callback.withHandle(handle);
209                if (!didTxnRollback) {
210                    handle.commit();
211                }
212            } catch (Throwable e) {
213                try {
214                    handle.rollback();
215                } catch (Exception rollback) {
216                    e.addSuppressed(rollback);
217                }
218                throw e;
219            } finally {
220                didTxnRollback = false;
221            }
222
223            return returnValue;
224        }
225
226        @Override
227        public <R, X extends Exception> R inTransaction(Handle handle,
228                                                        TransactionIsolationLevel level,
229                                                        HandleCallback<R, X> callback) throws X {
230            final TransactionIsolationLevel initial = handle.getTransactionIsolationLevel();
231            try {
232                handle.setTransactionIsolation(level);
233                return inTransaction(handle, callback);
234            } finally {
235                handle.setTransactionIsolation(initial);
236            }
237        }
238
239        private void restoreAutoCommitState(Handle handle) {
240            try {
241                if (initialAutocommit) {
242                    handle.getConnection().setAutoCommit(initialAutocommit);
243                    savepoints.clear();
244                    didBegin = false;
245                }
246            } catch (SQLException e) {
247                throw new UnableToRestoreAutoCommitStateException(e);
248            }
249        }
250    }
251}
